about_the_game:
The game soundtrack for 東方逆妙乱 ~ Ephemeral Unnatural Balance

Composed/Arranged by ExPorygon, Spectral Nexus, Popfan, Spaztique Explosive, and Kappatalist.
Most tracks originally composed by ZUN

Includes FLAC, MP3, and OGG formats

1. Ephemeral Spring ~ Tipping Scales
2. Dream Sunrise
3. Unfired Jar of Awakened Vengeance
4. Souls of the Dying Leaves
5. Legend of the Unloved Goddess
6. Initiate's Ascent ~ Autumnal Waterfall
7. Pack Mentality ~ Order Versus Curiosity
8. Under the Flower Banner ~ Miasmatic Fragrance
9. The Flower Bearer's March ~ Fairy General
10. The Contagious Addiction to Power
11. Sealed Innocence
12. Spring Equinox ~ Perfect Sky
13. Battle at the Capital of Flowers
14. Judgment of the Fairy Imperator ~ Fateful Spring
15. The Enchanted Library's Malling Jewel ~ Dionysus
16. Deal with a Devil
17. Sinister Ceremony ~ Dance with a Devil
18. Wicked Solomon's Successor
19. The Walk Home Is Paved in Wilted Wisteria
20. Garden of Ephemeral Flowers
21. Player's Score
22. Disputed Fantasy
23. Righteous Struggle ~ Duel with a Devil
